i = 1, np.random.seed(1000),
In [2]: rand1[i]
Out[2]: 0.32093154708985722

In [3]: rand2[i]
Out[3]: 1.272092071455694

Out[4]: 0.99866379524843041

Correctly matches excel numbers

i = 2, phi1, phi2, phi3 = -0.524134346	-2.001270195	0.355755596
S_plus_m[i] = S_plus_m[i - 1] + mu_m[i] * dt + (vol1_m[i] * -0.524134346 + vol2_m[i] * -2.001270195 + vol3_m[i] * 0.355755596) * math.sqrt(dt) + (d_S_plus_m[i] / d_tau_m[i]) * dt
